$comment: Long animation frames are ingested as long tasks
title: RumLongTaskEvent
description: Schema of all properties of a Long Task event

id.description: UUID of the long task or long animation frame

start_time.description: Start time of the long animation frame

entry_type.description: Type of the event: long task or long animation frame

duration.description: Duration in ns of the long task or long animation frame

blocking_duration.description: Duration in ns for which the animation frame was being blocked

render_start.description: Start time of the rendering cycle, which includes requestAnimationFrame callbacks, style and layout calculation, resize observer and intersection observer callbacks

style_and_layout_start.description: Start time of the time period spent in style and layout calculations

first_ui_event_timestamp.description: Start time of of the first UI event (mouse/keyboard and so on) to be handled during the course of this frame

is_frozen_frame.description: Whether this long task is considered a frozen frame

scripts.description: A list of long scripts that were executed over the course of the long frame

duration.description: Duration in ns between startTime and when the subsequent microtask queue has finished processing

pause_duration.description: Duration in ns of the total time spent in 'pausing' synchronous operations (alert, synchronous XHR)

forced_style_and_layout_duration.description: Duration in ns of the the total time spent processing forced layout and style inside this function

start_time.description: Time the entry function was invoked

source_url.description: The script resource name where available (or empty if not found)

source_function_name.description: The script function name where available (or empty if not found)

source_char_position.description: The script character position where available (or -1 if not found)

invoker.description: Information about the invoker of the script

invoker_type.description: Type of the invoker of the script

window_attribution.description: The container (the top-level document, or an <iframe>) the long animation frame occurred in

discarded.description: Whether the long task should be discarded or indexed
